instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Car . Follow the on-screen prompts to agree to the disclaimer. Tap Speak .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Car . Follow the on-screen prompts to agree to the disclaimer. Tap Speak .

From any Home screen, tap Messages . Tap the Compose icon. Choose one of the following options for entering the message recipient: Tap the Contacts icon to select one of your Contacts. To the left of the desired contact, tap the check box to select the check box. Tap Done . Tap the Enter recipient field and enter the recipient's phone number. Tap the Enter message field. Tap the Microphone key. Speak the desired text. You will be automatically directed back to the keyboard when you stop speaking. When finished, tap the Send icon.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key . Tap System settings . Select the General tab. Scroll to 'PERSONAL,' and then tap Language & input . Tap Default . Tap Setup input methods . Tap the desired keyboard.
From the alphabet keyboard, tap the 123? key. Tap the right arrow key to see more symbols. Tap the number and symbol keys as necessary. Tap the abc key to return to the alphabet keyboard.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key . Tap System settings . Select the General tab. Scroll to 'PERSONAL,' and then tap Language & input . Tap Default . Tap Setup input methods . Next to the desired keyboard, tap the Settings icon. Tap Word suggestion . Update the following options as desired: Auto correction Suggest next word Advanced word suggestion Clear history

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key . Tap System settings . Select the General tab. Scroll to 'PERSONAL,' and then tap Language & input . Tap Default . Next to 'LG Keyboard,' tap the Settings icon. Tap Additional settings Select or clear the Vibrate on keypress check box.
